hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7` cd "${WORKSPACE}"/docker/pic-sure-hpds-etl docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} .
mkdir -p "${WORKSPACE}"/docker_image_output cd "${WORKSPACE}"/docker_image_output docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-hpds-etl.tar.gz
HPDS_ETL_IMAGE=`docker load < ./pic-sure-hpds-etl.tar.gz | cut -d ' ' -f 3`
echo ${HPDS_ETL_IMAGE}
cd "${WORKSPACE}"
#cat /dev/urandom | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 32 | head -n 1 > hpds/encryption_key
mkdir hpds cp ${WORKSPACE}/metadata.json hpds/ cp ${WORKSPACE}/allConcepts.csv hpds/ cat /dev/urandom | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 32 | head -n 1 > hpds/encryption_key
# hpds/allConcepts.csv docker run -i -v "$(pwd)"/hpds:/opt/local/hpds -v "$(pwd)"/hpds:/opt/local/phenocube -eNO_ROLLUP=NO_ROLLUP -eHEAPSIZE=4096 -eLOADER_NAME=CSVLoaderNewSearch ${HPDS_ETL_IMAGE}
cd hpds ts=$(date '+%m-%d-%y')
touch conceptsToRemove.txt
tar zcf ras_dummy_data_javabins_full.tar.gz columnMeta.csv *.javabin encryption_key metadata.json conceptsToRemove.txt
#aws s3 cp nhanes_javabins_full.tar.gz s3://avillach-73-nhanes-etl/hpds/javabin/
#aws s3 cp columnMeta.csv s3://avillach-73-nhanes-etl/hpds/javabin/columnMeta_full.csv
#unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID #unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY #unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
